name: perryopen source project
short_description: Creating video conversion and burning application to host, upload digital content that is not copyright protected.   Similar to youtube, with more features with a simple, 3-step interface for burning, sharing, email creatives, galleries, and even dvd/movie content user's can charge a price to watch, allowing members to stream video to TV, burn videos to DVD and transcode videos to any mobile format. It will integrate with all your iTunes-compatible devices. Even PS3 playback burning software built in, if uploading user allows download.  Using email creatives, galleries, feedback, and ratings and content exit consoles and even dvd/movie content that converts automatically...
summary: creating open source video sharing software that shows, burn, play,fre
